title: Scraper configuration
description: Contains configuration data and scraping tree logic for Webscraper

proxies.description: List of proxy ip adresses in 127.0.0.1:4321 format

timeout.description: Array with minimum and maximum values of delay between downloading webpages in ms

start.description: array of different sizes of headless browser

contentselectors.description: List of chained css selectors of content to be scraped

parsetree.description: Definition of nodes of parsing logic

nextselector.description: css selector to find next link in html code. if missing not jumping

pageselector.description: css selector to find next link in html code. if missing not jumping

contselector.description: Index of css selectors to extract content in node urls pool
